message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

This paper proposes a system that utilizes machine learning and natural language processing techniques for automated ticket classification and answer selection for customer support. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves deep learning architectures, which suggests cs.LG (Machine Learning) as another likely sub-category. The use of ranking and feature engineering techniques for multi-classification tasks points towards cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as a possible sub-category. The paper also involves injection of prior knowledge through network architecture choices, which suggests cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves a real-world A/B test, which suggests cs.CY (Computers and Society) as a possible sub-category.
